content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Use the passage to answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify ONE purpose of the speech. b) Identify ONE historical development that may have influenced the views expressed in the speech. c) Identify ONE piece of evidence used by the author to support his argument that religion “can arouse men’s passions more than anything else.”

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
